name: Space! Train!! Murder!!!
description:
A Time Cop is never off the case! When your relaxing InterSol Express Space Train journey is interrupted by news of the murder of Mx. Sliptavian Gin, it's up to you to question the suspects, discover the clues, and when the train pulls into home station jump back in time to the start of the case - using what you've discovered to explore new avenues of investigation until you're brought the killer to justice.

Made on Train Jam 2019!

Writing: Gwynn Fulcher (@Gw1Valentine)
Scripting: Alexei Pepers (@ampepers)
Art: Elliot Davis (@moletotem)
Music: Doug Pennant (@Ludiotic)
